name: Ishar 3: The Seven Gates of Infinity
name_original: Ishar 3: The Seven Gates of Infinity
description:
Ishar 3: The Seven Gates of Infinity is a RPG game developed by Silmarils. It came out on 01-01-1994. It was published by Silmarils. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Ishar 3: The Seven Gates of Infinity is available on PC and Commodore / Amiga.
